issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

fields.summary: Return value for map, array, and struct needs to return a string

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Hive's float datatype is not supported by the Hive JDBC driver
fields.environment:
Create a Hive table containing a float column.
Then using the Hive JDBC driver execute a Hive query that selects data from this table. 
An error is then encountered.

comments.body: This should have been fixed by HIVE-1378 in trunk (0.7). Please give that a try.
